name: North Bali beachfront Dream
description: Bondalem Beach Club offers the opportunity to escape from the daily hustle, from crowds of tourists. This is the place where you can listen to the songs of nature, relish the beautiful sunsets and wonderful beach in Bali, located a few steps from your bungalow. This is a great place to explore the beauty of the underwater world. Here you will find unspoiled Bali beach with coral reef, large variety of amazingly beautiful fish.
